content: in stockinette in the round after blocking *for scarf* 22 sts & 40 row = 4 inches 10cm in garter stitch after blocking **tools** 8 stitch markers for the sweater / 3 stitch markers for the mini mitten / 1 stitch marker for the mini hat scrap yarn tapestry needle & crochet hook for adding tassels to the scarf **skills** knitting flat knitting in the round increases decreases ribbing
